import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { StudentContext } from "../App"; function Control() { let listContext = useContext(StudentContext) let newStudent = { studentId: '', studentName: '', studentAge: '', studentSex: '', studentDateBirth: '', studentPlaceBirth: '', studentAddress: '', } const addNewStudent = () => { listContext.isToggleAction(true, "CreateStudent", newStudent); } return (
) } export default Control
